sentences: Ta tegeles poissi p채rast, kuigi oli poisiga rahulik.
Minu venna pojaga me s천itsime parki m채ngida.
context: In Estonian, 'poisiga' translates to either 'with the boy' or 'with a boy'. The word is commonly used in daily conversation and appears frequently in texts involving children or young individuals. It can be part of both formal and informal speech.
